channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A ‘Wicked’ Tearful Talk With Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande
item.description: The stars of the new movie reflect on their long ride together, getting through Covid and the actors’ strike, and avoiding “playing to the green.”

item.title: American interest in moving abroad is about to ‘go into overdrive.’ These are the easiest countries to immigrate to
item.description: Immigration firms expect more Americans to look into moving abroad following Tuesday's election.

item.title: Donald Trump will make a $400,000 salary as president. His shares in Trump Media could keep him rich to the tune of $8 billion
item.description: Experts see the president-elect’s wealth growing by the day.

item.title: World Reacts to Donald Trump’s Win in U.S. Presidential Election
item.description: Donald J. Trump has said he would transform America’s relationship with allies and adversaries. He has pledged to end the war in Ukraine in 24 hours, ...

item.title: What a Trump Victory Means for Tech
item.description: Another Trump presidency will be good for crypto and Elon Musk, but every big tech company may not benefit from a more hands-off approach to antitrust...

item.title: Trump’s Win Ends a Post-World War II Era of U.S. Leadership
item.description: For the past four years, President Biden has argued that the first Trump term was a blip in American history. The election has proved that President-e...

item.title: U.S. Election Sends Alarming Message for Global Climate Efforts
item.description: The Trump victory sets back the world’s attempt to rein in dangerous levels of warming and potentially isolates the United States in the global energy...

item.title: Kamala Harris has conceded the election to Donald Trump in a private phone call
item.description: The aide, who declined to be identified discussing a private conversation, said Harris talked about the need for a peaceful transfer of power.

item.title: CEOs including Satya Nadella and Sam Altman are lining up to congratulate Donald Trump on his election victory
item.description: CEOs and business leaders took to social media to congratulate President-elect Donald Trump on his second White House victory.

item.title: Geoff Capes, World’s Strongest Man and Champion Bird Breeder, Dies at 75
item.description: He pulled dump trucks, flipped cars and tossed five-pound bricks as if they were Kleenex boxes. Tending to parakeets brought out his gentler side.

item.title: A Test of Independence for an Ultramarathon Runner With Autism
item.description: A man with autism, his devoted mother and a seemingly endless race. A story of resilience and love.

item.title: Netanyahu Faces Backlash for Firing Israel’s Defense Minister

item.title: World Reacts to Donald Trump’s Win in U.S. Presidential Election
item.description: Donald J. Trump has said he would transform America’s relationship with allies and adversaries. He has pledged to end the war in Ukraine in 24 hours, ...

item.title: Stocks and the Dollar Jump After Trump Wins Presidential Election
item.description: Bitcoin hit a record, Tesla stock soared and a wide range of markets around the world moved sharply as Donald J. Trump claimed victory.

item.title: Americans paid $100B since 2008 to access their own money. I am petitioning the Fed to end this racket
item.description: The consequences of slow payments? Profits for banks and costly workarounds for those who can least afford it.
